verses.verse: And I <S%G1492>looked,<s%> and, <S%G2400>see,<s%> a <S%G721>Lamb<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G3735>mount<s%> <S%G4622>Sion,<s%> and with him an <S%G1540>hundred<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> and <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> his <S%G3962>Father's<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> in their <S%G3359>foreheads.<s%>

And I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> as the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5204>waters,<s%> and as the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1027>thunder:<s%> and I <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of <S%G2790>harpers<s%> <S%G2789>harping<s%> with their <S%G2788>harps:<s%>

And they <S%G103>sung<s%> as it were a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G5603>song<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> and <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>beasts,<s%> and the <S%G4245>elders:<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G3129>learn<s%> that <S%G5603>song<s%> but the <S%G1540>hundred<s%> and <S%G5062>forty<s%> and <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G59>redeemed<s%> from the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

<S%G3778>These<s%> are they <S%G3739>which<s%> were not <S%G3435>defiled<s%> with <S%G1135>women;<s%> for they are <S%G3933>virgins.<s%> <S%G3778>These<s%> are they <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> <S%G3699>wherever<s%> <S%G302><s%> he <S%G5217>goes.<s%> <S%G3778>These<s%> were <S%G59>redeemed<s%> from among <S%G444>men,<s%> being the first <S%G536>fruits<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> and to the <S%G721>Lamb.<s%>

And in their <S%G4750>mouth<s%> was <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1388>guile:<s%> for they are <S%G299>without<s%> <S%G299>fault<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4072>fly<s%> in the <S%G3321>middle<s%> of <S%G3321>heaven,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G166>everlasting<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> to <S%G2097>preach<s%> to them that <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1484>nation,<s%> and <S%G5443>kindred,<s%> and <S%G1100>tongue,<s%> and <S%G2992>people,<s%>

<S%G3004>Saying<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G5399>Fear<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> to him; for the <S%G5610>hour<s%> of his <S%G2920>judgment<s%> is <S%G2064>come:<s%> and <S%G4352>worship<s%> him that <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> and the <S%G4077>fountains<s%> of <S%G5204>waters.<s%>

And there <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G32>angel,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G897>Babylon<s%> is <S%G4098>fallen,<s%> is <S%G4098>fallen,<s%> that <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> she <S%G4222>made<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G4222>drink<s%> of the <S%G3631>wine<s%> of the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of her <S%G4202>fornication.<s%>

And the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> them, <S%G3004>saying<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> man <S%G4352>worship<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%> and his <S%G1504>image,<s%> and <S%G2983>receive<s%> his <S%G5480>mark<s%> in his <S%G3359>forehead,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> in his <S%G5495>hand,<s%>

The <S%G846>same<s%> shall <S%G4095>drink<s%> of the <S%G3631>wine<s%> of the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G2767>poured<s%> out <S%G194>without<s%> <S%G194>mixture<s%> <S%G1722>into<s%> the <S%G4221>cup<s%> of his <S%G3709>indignation;<s%> and he shall be <S%G928>tormented<s%> with <S%G4442>fire<s%> and <S%G2303>brimstone<s%> in the <S%G1799>presence<s%> of the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G32>angels,<s%> and in the <S%G1799>presence<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb:<s%>

And the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> of their <S%G929>torment<s%> <S%G305>ascends<s%> up for <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever:<s%> and they <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G372>rest<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2532>nor<s%> <S%G3571>night,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%> and his <S%G1504>image,<s%> and <S%G1536>whoever<s%> <S%G2983>receives<s%> the <S%G5480>mark<s%> of his <S%G3686>name.<s%>

<S%G5602>Here<s%> is the <S%G5281>patience<s%> of the <S%G40>saints:<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> are they that <S%G5083>keep<s%> the <S%G1785>commandments<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to me, <S%G1125>Write,<s%> <S%G3107>Blessed<s%> are the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G599>die<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> from now <S%G534>on:<s%> <S%G3483>Yes,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> that they may <S%G373>rest<s%> from their <S%G2873>labors;<s%> and their <S%G2041>works<s%> do <S%G190>follow<s%> them.

And I <S%G1492>looked,<s%> and <S%G2400>behold<s%> a <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G3507>cloud,<s%> and on the <S%G3507>cloud<s%> one <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> to the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> his <S%G2776>head<s%> a <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G4735>crown,<s%> and in his <S%G5495>hand<s%> a <S%G3691>sharp<s%> <S%G1407>sickle.<s%>

And <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out of the <S%G3485>temple,<s%> <S%G2896>crying<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> to him that <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G3507>cloud,<s%> <S%G3992>Thrust<s%> in your <S%G1407>sickle,<s%> and <S%G2325>reap:<s%> for the <S%G5610>time<s%> is <S%G2064>come<s%> for you to <S%G2325>reap;<s%> for the <S%G2326>harvest<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> is <S%G3583>ripe.<s%>

And he that <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G3507>cloud<s%> <S%G906>thrust<s%> in his <S%G1407>sickle<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth;<s%> and the <S%G1093>earth<s%> was <S%G2325>reaped.<s%>

And <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out of the <S%G3485>temple<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> he <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G3691>sharp<s%> <S%G1407>sickle.<s%>

And <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out from the <S%G2379>altar,<s%> which <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G4442>fire;<s%> and <S%G5455>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G2906>cry<s%> to him that <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G3691>sharp<s%> <S%G1407>sickle,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3992>Thrust<s%> in your <S%G3691>sharp<s%> <S%G1407>sickle,<s%> and <S%G5166>gather<s%> the <S%G1009>clusters<s%> of the <S%G288>vine<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth;<s%> for her <S%G4718>grapes<s%> are fully <S%G187>ripe.<s%>

And the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G906>thrust<s%> in his <S%G1407>sickle<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and <S%G5166>gathered<s%> the <S%G288>vine<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and <S%G906>cast<s%> it <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> wine <S%G3025>press<s%> of the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And the wine <S%G3025>press<s%> was <S%G3961>trodden<s%> <S%G1854>without<s%> the <S%G4172>city,<s%> and <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out of the wine <S%G3025>press,<s%> even to the <S%G2462>horse<s%> <S%G5469>bridles,<s%> by the <S%G575>space<s%> of a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> and <S%G1812>six<s%> <S%G5516>hundred<s%> <S%G4712>furlongs.<s%>
